name: ColourWars (tomputergames)
description:
~ Colour Wars ~
  • You are the blue paint thrower
  • Move around the edge of the board using the arrow keys
  • Press [x] (or [z]) to throw paint across the board
  • Paint flows in a straight line until it:
    • Hits the opposite edge
    • Hits an obstacle (gray block)
    • Hits paint of the opposite colour
  • Whenever you move, the red paint throw(ers) will move exactly the same way (you control them too!)
  • Paint can only be thrown from each edge position once (it fills with the colour thrown from it)
  • The game is over when paint has been thrown from every edge position (the number of unused positions is shown in the top-left)
  • You win if more square are blue than red.
